cv.version: English version 2.2. Last modification the 09 July 2008.
cv.summary: Java/J2EE software engineer. Information systems design and implementation. OOP/AOP. N-tiers architectures. RDBMS/SQL. Design patterns. UML. RUP, agile software development. European education. Master degree in Computer Science. 3 years of international experience (projects for IT-consulting, insurance and software companies). 21 IT-certifications from Brainbench system. Fluent french, good english, russian and ukrainian are the mother tongues. Purposeful and responsible.

organisation.name: University Paris-Est Marne-la-Vallée
organisation.desc: DESS « Communication, Réseau, Image », filière Réseau (actuel Master Informatique).

organisation.name: Conservatoire National des Arts et Métiers (CNAM)
Ukrainian State University of Chemical Engineering
organisation.desc: Master Degree in Computer Science, with honour (2004).

company.name: Teamlog
company.jobDesc: Participation in the design, development and management of the Java/J2EE projects. Solving critical technical problems. Setup project infrastructure: SVN, builds, unit tests, etc. Responsible for communication with customers. Technologies: Java/J2EE, Servlets/JSP, JAAS, JAD decompiler, MySQL, LDAP, Ant, DBUnit, Linux, RPM.

company.name: DVK-Tech
company.jobDesc: Java/J2EE consulting and development for different companies. The list of projects done with DVK-Tech is presented below and marked by ***.

company.name: Générali
company.jobDesc: Development of Java-based enterprise server. Technical design and implementation of different integration modules for connecting externs information systems. The development process is based on some industrial standards of the software building. Technologies: JAVA/J2EE, EJB, application server WebSphere 6.1, Oracle, SQL, MyEclipse, Rational Rose, UML. Advanced using of SQL language.

company.name: SMI-Mutuelle
company.jobDesc: Audit of a web-application that represents the company business workflow. Analysis and documentation of the existing architecture with further recommendations for optimisation and evolution. Writing the technical documentation describing the development environment and deployment process. Technologies : Java/J2EE, Servlet, Java Service Wrapper, Winstone, Oracle 8; UML diagrams.

company.name: Mondial-Assistance
company.jobDesc: Participation in the design and development of « e-commerce » projects. Persistence layer has been implemented with Hibernate and JDO (XCalia implementation). Bridge between business logic and presentation layer was developed according to MVC pattern on Struts framework. Web GUI-components development with AJAX. Architecture design and implementation of different application modules. Implementation of business logic layer. Technologies : Java/J2EE, Struts 1.3, Hibernate 3.0, JDO (Xcalia implementation), Servlet/JSP, JSTL, Tomcat 5.5, MySQL, Oracle, MS SQL Server, FreeMaker, Common-Controls, many librairies from Jakarta Commons.

company.name: Web Agency DUKE
company.jobDesc: Design and realization of web site "back-office" solutions based on 3-tier architecture; persistence, business object layer (POJO), deployment ; logging, security and emailing modules. Developing of the security module for a web-application with Tomcat container managed security. Persistence layer implemented only with DAO's based on pure JDBC API. Programming the java-façades for Flash-based GUI-interface. Web GUI-components development with AJAX. Conception and realization of standalone application (server) aimed to survey the availability of internet sites. This application was developed with multithreading features as daemon for Linux Debian OS. Participation in projects architecture design. Technologies : Java/J2EE, JDBC, Servlet/JSP, Tomcat 5.5, MySQL 4.1, PostgreSQL, Log4j, Velocity, JSVC.

company.name: Information Systems Development
company.jobDesc: Development of web-based time management system. Accomplished tasks: developing gui-components based on JSF; application server migration from WebSphere to JBoss; implementation of stress-test scripts with OpenSTA ans SCL language; application maintenance management. Technologies: application servers WebSphere and JBoss, RDBMS Oracle, Hibernate, Spring, JSF, JNDI.

company.name: LegitiName
company.jobDesc: Responsible for product evolution "SiteAudit". Specification and implementation of core project functionality. Preparing technical documentation. Technologies : Programming on framework .NET, language C#, XML (XPath, XSD), ADO.NET, Microsoft SQL Server, librairies "Microsoft XMLDiff and XMLPatch 1.0" and "HtmlAgilityPack" by Simon Mournier.

technology-domain.name: Programming languages
technology-domain.itemsList: Java , C# , Pascal, PHP. ;Java frameworks and librairies: Log4j, Spring, Struts, Hibernate, many sub-projets of Apache Commons, Velocity, iText, JSVC. XML (XSL, XPath, XSD), HTML(CSS, JavaScript).

technology-domain.name: J2EE
technology-domain.itemsList: Core Java, Application/web servers, JDBC, Servlets/JSP, JNDI, RMI, EJB, Web Services. Application/web servers : JBoss, WebSphere, Tomcat, Resin. Deep understanding of basis of distributed n-tier architecture: business objects (POJO and EJB), persistance, security issues, transactions, multithreading, logging.

technology-domain.name: RDBMS
technology-domain.itemsList: ORACLE 9i/10g, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Microsoft SQL Server 2000; langage SQL.

technology-domain.name: Tools
technology-domain.itemsList: Eclipse, NetBeans, Microsoft Visual Studio, JProfiler, ANT, Maven, CVS, SVN, SQuirreL, Toad, Far.

technology-domain.name: Software methodologies
technology-domain.itemsList: Design Patterns (GoF+GRASP) , UML, Rational Unified Process, agile methodologies (with JUnit and continouos integretion server TeamCity).

technology-domain.name: Certifications
technology-domain.itemsList: I have earned the following certificates from Brainbench system:

language.name: French
language.desc: Fluent. More than 10 years of experience. Having the following french diplomas of the Common European Framework of References for languages: DELF B1, B2, B3, DALF C2.

language.name: English
language.desc: Reading/writing – very good, oral expression – good.

item.name: Interests
item.desc: Java, software design and implementation, Graphical User Interface (GUI) design and usability, geography, foreign languages.
